text: ai rasool tum une zara poochho to ki tumhen aasamaan va zameen se kaun rozee deta hai ya (tumhaare) kaan aur (tumhaaree) onkhon ka kaun maalik hai aur kaun shakhsh murde se zinda ko nikaalata hai aur zinda se murde ko nikaalata hai aur har amr (kaam) ka bandobast kaun karata hai to phauran bol uthenge ki khuda (ai rasool) tum kaho to kya tum is par bhee (usase) nahin darate ho
